seriesJson.title: Dimensions of a new age
seriesJson.description: This series explores the new developments and challenges that have emerged in the wake of the "space age" that occurred in the mid-20th century.

node.title: Philosophy and space
node.description: This program focuses on the mingling of philosophical issues and space during the space age.

node.title: New advances in space research
node.description: This program focuses on the latest advances in space research during the space age.

node.title: Economics in the space age
node.description: This program of focuses on the economic trends of the space age.

node.title: Influence of the space age on government
Public education for the space
node.description: This program features guests discussing public education during the space age.

node.title: Education in the space age
node.description: This program explores the issue of education in the space age.

node.title: Weather developments in the space age
node.description: This program focuses on developments in meteorology during the space age.

node.title: Legal dilemmas of the space age
node.description: This program explores the legal issues that have emerged and must be dealt with during the space age.

node.title: Advances in communications systems
node.description: This program explores significant advancements made in communications during the space age.

node.title: Introduction
node.description: This program presents a speech by John B. Medaris, assessing the new challenges of the space age.

node.title: Medical aspects
node.description: This program discusses the medical aspects of the space age.
